## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0769e482bedb12e408ce6c42ac27d6dc8c68738460e633e4e2bea3c3a38d6081)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'com.revenuecat.purchases-unity' @ 14.4.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
